name: IPOP - Improving Pregnancy Outcomes Program
short_desc: Information, referrals and support to pregnant and postpartum women
description: Aims to reduce the number of pre-term, low and very low birth weight births, as well as infant deaths. Works to improve pregnancy outcomes by ensuring eligible residents of the IPOP target area have access to quality prenatal/postnatal care. Program components include case management/care coordination of pregnant and parenting women, community health education, support groups and Boot Camps for new dads.
